The '''Outsider Shrine''' is a shrine located next to [[Washizu]]. It is part of the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] [[Washizu's Prayers]], where it can be prayed at three times per day, with a purple orb appearing with each prayer. After said Hidden Exploration Objective is completed, the Outsider Shrine will no longer be interactible with.
